name: Awesome Delicious Italian Food - Pizza Maker Restaurant
name_original: Awesome Delicious Italian Food - Pizza Maker Restaurant
description:
Who doesn't love some delicious pizza? Try this brand new game to create your own!

[Features]
-Make your own dough from scratch!
-Create your tomato sauce for the pizza!
-Top off your pizza with different seasonings, veggies, & MEATS!
-Cut your pizza the way you want!
-Save & share your favorite master piece!

This game is perfect for all ages and will keep you ridiculously entertained!



*Please note: This game is free to play, but offers in-game purchases made with real money.
